attributes.action: Reduce road tax for low emission vehicles in 2017
attributes.additional_details: Road tax will be £140 for  all cars after 2017  on the cars 2nd birthday.   cars worth over £40,000 will be paying additional charges for five years including electric cars
attributes.background: Reduce road tax for low emission cars in 2017 to encourage people to continue buying low emission cars  and not buying higher emission cars
